resources.string: "He kōwae Xposed e takataungia ana i ngā kupu katoa ki tētahi taupānga ki tētahi atu reo"

"AllTrans-Ka Whakawhiti Ngā Taupānga katoa Pēnei i te whakawhitinga whārangi tukutuku, engari mō ngā taupānga Android. He Aha AllTrans Ka whakahōu i ngā kupu katoa i tētahi taupānga i tētahi reo mai i te reo kotahi ki tētahi atu wāhaere taunoa. Kī atu ki te tauira i tētahi taupānga e hiahia ana koe ki te whakamahi, engari e mōhio ana koe ki te Ingarihi anake. Kātahi ka huakina e koe te taupānga e hiahiatia ana, te kupu katoa i te taupānga, ka noho, kawhakahōutia e tōna ingarihi equivalents. He rite tonu tēnei ki te huarahi e Whakawhiti Aunoa ana i ngā pūtirotiro. Whakaritenga ? Xposed anga , VirtualXposed rānei kua tāuta me te whakahaere rānei. Mēnā He BootLoader maukati, he waea hutia atu-kore rānei Ka taea te tikiake Taichi (he xposed emulator) mai i https://github.com/taichi-framework/TaiChi/releases/ Otiia ka taea e koe te tikiake VirtualXposed (he xposed emulator pēnei i te mokowā wātea, ngā taupānga takirua) mai i https://github.com/android-hacker/VirtualXposed/releases Ki te kore koe e Mōhio ki Te Xposed, ki Te Virtualxposed rānei, kāore tēnei taupānga i te pēneii teWhakamahi i te AllTrans ? Āta titiro kua whakakāngia AllTrans te XposedInstaller/Taichi. ? I te ripa Tautuhinga ā-Ao, kōwhiria te Takatau i te Reo, ka Whakawhiti ki te Reo. ? I roto i Ngā Taupānga hei Whakawhiti i te ripa, kimihia te taupānga e hiahia ana koe ki te takatau, pāwhiritia te pouakataki ki te taha. ? Katia, ka tīmata anō i te taupānga e hiahia ana koe ki te whakamāori! "
